entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Tatamagouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets this evening then to snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
